# Example

## Usage
`@example`
 
## Overview
Provide an example of how to use the documented item.

## Example
```javascript
/**
 * @function add
 * @param {Number} a
 * @param {Number} b
 * @returns {Number}
 * @example
 * add(2 ,3) // returns 5
*/
const add = (a, b) => {
    return a + b;
};
```

**[_More Info_](http://usejsdoc.org/tags-example.html)**
